casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant/Cross-Appellee,
v.
Kenneth Carl GRONDIN, III, Defendant-Appellee/Cross-Appellant. SC: 158196
COA: 331809 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 19, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 12, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals and the application for leave to appeal as cross-appellant are considered, and they are DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
